properties.name: app.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token generation and validation

properties.name: app.stomp.broker-host
properties.description: Host address for the STOMP message broker

properties.name: app.stomp.broker-port
properties.description: Port number for the STOMP message broker

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration-hours
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in hours
